reviewText: This DVD gives a good overview of what makes the Glock stand out from other handguns. It covers concealed carry holsters (If only this would apply to Australia), draw techniques and dry fire practice. With lots of good demonstrations this give a great introduction to the Glock series of handguns and what makes it stand out from the rest.
I tried once and again, and again to run this DVD on my PC, never worked.  Was it recorded on a DVD-R?.....I'll prefer DVDs+R since they are more compatible!
